result.arabic_text: أَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ
result.translation: 53. Miyey iskula dardaarmeen arrinkani8? Mayee’ waa qolo xadgudub badan.
result.footnotes: 8. Miyey gaaladii beri hore u soo gudbiyeen hadalladan kuwaan hadda jira, sidaa darteed ay u yidhaahdeen isla hadalkoodii oo kale?.
